channel.title: How do i set it so drags drop leather not hide?

item.title: How do i set it so drags drop leather not hide?
item.dc:creator: @digzey digzey
item.description:
@digzey wrote:

[quote=“Baybee, post:4, topic:140662”]Open your NpcDrops.cfg.

[code]//--------NPCID---------DropType--------Item----Amount–
npcdrop = 941 1 1745 1
npcdrop = 55 1 2505 1
npcdrop = 53 1 2507 1
npcdrop = 54 1 2509 1

[ENDOFNPCDROPLIST][/code]

The items 1745 - Green Leather
2505 - Blue Leather
2507 - Red Leather
2509 - Black Leather

They replaced the items 1753 - Green Dragonhide
1751 - Blue Dragonhide
1749 - Red Dragonhide
1747 - Black Dragonhide

Hope this helped.

Edit: In the code, ths is about your dragons only. You could add other NpcDrops.[/quote]

yep its kool

Read full topic
item.source: How do i set it so drags drop leather not hide?

item.title: How do i set it so drags drop leather not hide?
item.dc:creator: @Baybee Baybee
item.description:
@Baybee wrote:

Open your NpcDrops.cfg.

[code]//--------NPCID---------DropType--------Item----Amount–
npcdrop = 941 1 1745 1
npcdrop = 55 1 2505 1
npcdrop = 53 1 2507 1
npcdrop = 54 1 2509 1

[ENDOFNPCDROPLIST][/code]

The items 1745 - Green Leather
2505 - Blue Leather
2507 - Red Leather
2509 - Black Leather

They replaced the items 1753 - Green Dragonhide
1751 - Blue Dragonhide
1749 - Red Dragonhide
1747 - Black Dragonhide

Hope this helped.

Edit: In the code, ths is about your dragons only. You could add other NpcDrops.
